Registration  : We only register new clients on Saturdays from 9:00 a.m. to Noon. New clients are those who do not yet have a client number from Feeding South Florida. Also, if there are any changes to be made to your household information, please come during this time.    Distribution Schedule  : Client-choice shopping on Saturdays (all day) at Nina's Place is open to neighbors living in 33441, 33442, 33064, 33060, 33062, and 33069. We also have a box distribution on Thursday afternoons (3:30 pm to 4:30 pm) for neighbors living outside of those three cities and already registered with Feeding South Florida. Reservations on Plentiful will still be required to shop on Saturdays or pick up a box on Thursdays. As a part of the Feeding South Florida network, we know that there are hundreds of additional food distribution sites across South Florida that all registered clients are welcome to visit. For more information and an explanation of the Plentiful reservation system, visit our website:  https://www.ninasplacedfb.org .     Hygiene Items Distribution   (1st Saturday): You will be able to choose items from the list provided. Items include toothbrushes, toothpaste, men's and women's deodorant, shampoo and conditioner, soap, razors, feminine products, and adult diapers. Requests can be submitted here:  https://forms.office.com/r/fBDH1izL7q      Diaper Distribution   (Weekly): In order to be added to our distribution list, you will need to show your photo ID and birth certificate(s) for the babies/children that need diapers. You will not receive diapers if your information has not been verified.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Joel Smith", "contactPhone": "954-421-3146", "contactEmail": "info@ninasplacedfb.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Reservations", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Prepared Food / Grab and Go, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 45, "regionName": "Feeding South Florida", "logoBlobNameSmall": "f8218402-042e-413d-9a89-cf1c54cb9c30.png", "website": "https://feedingsouthflorida.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Thursday 3:30 PM-4:30 PM (Box Distribution for Non-Local Neighbors)", "Saturday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM (Client-Choice Market for Local Neighbors [33441, 33442, 33064, 33060, 33062, and 33069])"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
